segments.text: Do you have any year-end benefits ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don â€™ t know till now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just saw a piece of news , that a group of white color workers hold a flour war in the office because of dissatisfaction of the year-end benefits .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why they hold a flour war ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They got rice , flour and oil as presents , while the leadership got 1000 yuan shopping card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is said that the presents they got value less than 200 yuan , and it is no use for them at all , because they don't cook by themselves .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But how guilty to waste food !
segments.speaker: S2
